uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hadoop

Class AutoWritable

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.hadoop.AutoWritable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DosJob.DoSAttack, FlowRecord, IP, ScanningJob.PortScan, ScanningJob.PortScanKey, Statistic, Threat

    public abstract class AutoWritable
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    Acts as a base class for any Writable. Works via reflection as long as all of its fields are Writable (not primitive) and it has a non-private constructor taking zero arguments.
